https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kxQv7T28AXzDcZsGUOCLkuZAGbn.jpg When a sex worker hires a gay songwriter to care for her disabled son, the ensuing bonds that form offer a complex portrayal of love and family. Do Paise Ki Dhoop, Chaar Aane Ki Baarish
